DOC.brief_summary: Enoxaparin 0.75mg/kg BW is not inferior to weight adjusted unfractionated heparin as anticoagulation for PCI
DOC.brief_title: Enoxaparin Versus Unfractionated Heparin in PCI
DOC.criteria: PCI for stable ischemia or ACS Cardiogenic shock, Pretreatment with study drugs, Lack of informed consent
